i1.name: Royal_Privilege
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Qiyana's''' [[basic attack]]s and [[champion ability|basic abilities]] deal {{pp|15 to 83|color=physical damage}} {{as|(+ 45% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|'''additional''' physical damage|physical damage}} to affected enemies.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

Gathering an ''Element'' with {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}} resets ''Royal Privilege's'' per-target {{sti|cooldown}} for units affected by ''Royal Privilege'' using a different ''Element'' (or no ''Element'').
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Qiyana's basic attacks and champion ability deal 15 − 83 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP) additional physical damage to affected enemies.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
Gathering an Element with Qiyana's Terrashape resets Royal Privilege's per-target cooldown for units affected by Royal Privilege using a different Element (or no Element).
i1.notes:
* ''Royal Privilege's'' trigger from a basic attack can be {{tip|blocked}} (bonus damage is negated and the on-target cooldown does not apply).
* ''Royal Privilege'' will not apply a cooldown to targets that are hit with an {{ai|Elemental Wrath|Qiyana}} that has a different {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana|Element}} than the {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana|Element}} '''Qiyana''' currently holds.
** This does not occur if a new {{ai|Elemental Wrath|Qiyana}} with a different {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana|Element}} is cast before the first one lands.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Royal Privilege's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

q1.name: Edge_of_Ixtal
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' slashes forward in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first. ''Edge of Ixtal'' deals 150% damage against {{tip|monsters}}.
Upon gathering an element with {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}}, ''Edge of Ixtal'' is upgraded to ''Elemental Wrath'' and its {{sti|cooldown}} is reset.

If cast during {{ais|Audacity|Qiyana}} dash towards an enemy {{tip|champion}} and the target is within 150 units of '''Qiyana''' at the end of the dash, ''Edge of Ixtal'' will autonomously aim at the target.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana slashes forward in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first. Edge of Ixtal deals 150% damage against monsters.
Upon gathering an element with Qiyana's Terrashape, Edge of Ixtal is upgraded to Elemental Wrath and its cooldown is reset.
If cast during Qiyana's Audacity dash towards an enemy champion and the target is within 150 units of Qiyana at the end of the dash, Edge of Ixtal will autonomously aim at the target.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 170}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|50*0.75 to 170*0.75}} {{as|(+ {{ap|75*0.75}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* If cast during {{ai|Audacity|Qiyana}} and the target uses a dash or blink or is no longer in vision, ''Edge of Ixtal'' will aim at the target's last location prior to them starting the dash or blink or being in vision.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 75% bonus AD)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

q2.name: Elemental_Wrath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' consumes her blade's current ''Element'' and {{tip|projectile|hurls}} it in the target direction, detonating in a line upon colliding with an enemy or reaching maximum range, and triggering a bonus effect based on the ''Element''.

Enemies struck by the blade are dealt ''Edge of Ixtal's'' {{as|physical damage}}, reduced to 75% against subsequent units beyond the closest. ''Elemental Wrath'' deals 150% damage against {{tip|monsters}}.

{{sbc|{{as|Brush}}:}} The blade raises a ''grass trail'' behind '''Qiyana''' that travels forth and lasts for up-to 3 seconds, granting '''Qiyana''' {{tip|invisibility}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} until she attacks, casts an ability other than {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}}, or exits the trail.
{{sbc|{{as|River}}:}} {{tip|root|Roots}} enemies hit for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, then {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 20% for 1 second.
{{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}:}} Enemies hit while below {{sti|{{as|50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}} are dealt {{ccs|+60% '''bonus''' damage|physical}}.
q2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana consumes her blade's current Element and hurls it in the target direction, detonating in a line upon colliding with an enemy or reaching maximum range, and triggering a bonus effect based on the Element.
Enemies struck by the blade are dealt Edge of Ixtal's physical damage, reduced to 75% against subsequent units beyond the closest. Elemental Wrath deals 150% damage against monsters.
Brush: The blade raises a grass trail behind Qiyana that travels forth and lasts for up-to 3 seconds, granting Qiyana invisibility and 20% bonus movement speed until she attacks, casts an ability other than Qiyana's Terrashape, or exits the trail.
River: Roots enemies hit for 0.5 seconds, then slows them by 20% for 1 second.
Terrain: Enemies hit while below 50% of their maximum health are dealt Unknown value: ccs / +60% bonus damage / physical.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 170}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|50*0.75 to 170*0.75}} {{as|(+ {{ap|75*0.75}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 35,35,35,35,35 as 35
q2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '7,7,7,7,7' as '7'

• Bonus Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

w1.name: Terrashape
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While holding an ''Element'', '''Qiyana''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' attack range}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on her basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}}, {{ai|Audacity|Qiyana}} and the {{ai|Elemental Wrath|Qiyana}} cast that discharges it. While [[Combat status|out-of-combat]] and moving near the ''Element'' currently being held, she gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dashes}} up to 300 units towards the target location while also gathering an ''Element'' of the nearest {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}}, {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} she targeted, enchanting her blade.
''A target Element is required to cast this ability''.
Once ''Terrashape'' has been learned, '''Qiyana''' is automatically given the {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} element upon [[Death|respawning]].
'''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Terrashape''.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains bonus attack speed, 25 bonus attack range and bonus magic damage on her basic attacks on-hit, Qiyana's Audacity and the Qiyana's Elemental Wrath cast that discharges it. While Combat status and moving near the Element currently being held, she gains bonus movement speed.
Active: Qiyana dashes up to 300 units towards the target location while also gathering an Element of the nearest Unknown value: cci / Terrashape Brush.png Brush, Unknown value: cci / Terrashape River.png River or Unknown value: cci / Terrashape Rock.png Terrain she targeted, enchanting her blade.
A target Element is required to cast this ability.
Once Terrashape has been learned, Qiyana is automatically given the Unknown value: cci / Terrashape Rock.png Terrain element upon Death.
Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during Terrashape.
w1.notes:
* ''Terrashape'' does not interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* The water puddles formed by the {{ui|Ocean Drake|Ocean Rift}} on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} count as valid terrain for obtaining the {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} element.
* The {{tip|brush|brushes}} grown by {{cai|Brushmaker|Ivern}} count for gathering the {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} element.
* Passive bonus damage from basic attacks can be {{tip|blocked}}.
* The passive damage works with {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} ''Phantom Hit''.
* {{Pending for test}}: Passive bonus damage interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 45% AP)
  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Audacity
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} if they are still in range upon arrival.
'''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Audacity''.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing them physical damage if they are still in range upon arrival.
Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during Audacity.
e1.notes: * ''Audacity'' only damages targets if within 250 range at the end of the dash.

r1.name: Supreme_Display_of_Talent
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' sends a ''windblast'' in the target direction that {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} all enemies within its path and stops upon hitting {{as|terrain}}.

The ''windblast'' then creates an erupting shockwave across any {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} it passes through, as well as around the borders of {{as|terrain}} it reaches, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck, with the damage based on the target's health ratio being capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{pp|changedisplay=true|type=proximity|0.5;1|0;X}} seconds, and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area along its path each for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana sends a windblast in the target direction that knocks back all enemies within its path and stops upon hitting terrain.
The windblast then creates an erupting shockwave across any River or Brush it passes through, as well as around the borders of terrain it reaches, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck, with the damage based on the target's health ratio being capped against monsters, stunning them for 0;X ‒ undefined seconds, and granting sight of the area along its path each for 0.75 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 170% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
{{st|Capped percentage damage|{{ap|500 to 1000}}}}
r1.notes:
* The windblast needs only to reach near terrain to trigger the terrain shockwave.
* Artificial terrain (e.g, {{cai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{cai|Weaver's Wall|Taliyah}}, {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) touching map terrain will be treated as a single piece of terrain, even when bridging two pieces of map terrain together; the shockwave will wrap around all connecting terrain. The shockwave's path is determined once it initially spreads; any expired terrain will be treated as if it were still there.
* {{tip|Projectile|Projectile-intercepting}} effects will block the windblast but not the shockwave.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 170% bonus AD) (+ 10% of target's maximum health)
  • Capped percentage damage:
